metadata.Title: CVE-2019-16239 on Ubuntu 22.04 ESM (jammy) - medium.
metadata.Description:
process_http_response in OpenConnect before 8.05 has a Buffer Overflow when a malicious server uses HTTP chunked encoding with crafted chunk sizes.

Update Instructions:

Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2019-16239` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
by updating your system to the following package versions:

libopenconnect5 - 8.20-1
openconnect - 8.20-1
No subscription required

criterions.comment: openconnect package in jammy, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '8.20-1').
